monster.name: Howler
monster.languages: understands commands given in any language but can't speak.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The howler has advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The howler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Remley Farr - Fetch the Rucksack Howlers (Homebrew)

monster.name: Simon Rucksack
monster.languages: understands common, Halfling, and Gnoll but can't speak

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage.

action.name: Domesticate Gnoll
action.text: Simon charms a gnoll that he can see within 30 feet. The charmed gnoll regards Simon as an ally and will fight for him until he dies.

monster.description: Source: Remley Farr - Fetch the Rucksack Howlers (Homebrew)

monster.name: Underfang

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
Underfang is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Underfang has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, spare the dying, thaumaturgy • 1st level (4 slots): bane, command, inflict wounds • 2nd level (3 slots): aid, hold person, spiritual weapon (flail)

trait.name: Unlife
trait.text: Any necrotic damage that Underfang deals to an undead creature instead restores hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Mace
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Risen Infantry
action.text: Underfang resurrects a dead gnoll to fight for him. Any gnolls brought back to life this way are brought back as gnoll witherlings. Underfang cannot use this ability to bring gnoll witherlings back to life.

monster.spells: guidance, spare the dying, thaumaturgy, bane, command, inflict wounds, aid, hold person, spiritual weapon
monster.description: Source: Remley Farr - Fetch the Rucksack Howlers (Homebrew)
